channel.title: The laws of Merching?
channel.description: Can someone teach me the laws of merching? I am aware it takes time but it is very profitable and now that the boys are nuked and the economy is setteling down, must be working aswell again. Teach me your wayzzz!!!!! I must earn some money.

item.title: The laws of Merching?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:23, topic:420298”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=522855.msg3803791#msg3803791 date=1320272051]

Buy an item for 5% above market, write down the price you get it for, thats the sale price. Sell the item for 5% under, thats your buy price. Now to make that buying and selling go faster increase the buy price by 1-3gp and decrease the sell price by 1-3 gp. Flipping is easy.

Wait wouldn’t that be the wrong way round? Surely you would want to buy for 5% below market and sell for market or above?

I don’t merch that much however so I might have misunderstood.

The method I put up is how to find the “buy” and “sell” point for items and how to tweak them to go faster.
[/quote]So basically flipping.

@Frell, Yea right. I never get the chance to talk to any.[/quote]
Flipping makes more profit in my opinion. Plus the investment in the items is less then in a long term merch which could take days of holding vary valuable items that may crash when you sleep.

@Frell, mods don’t get any more information then we do, unless it is regarding to new rules or methods of bot busting.

Read full topic

item.title: The laws of Merching?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:21, topic:420298”][quote author=Anieli link=topic=522855.msg3803259#msg3803259 date=1320237685]

Buy an item for 5% above market, write down the price you get it for, thats the sale price. Sell the item for 5% under, thats your buy price. Now to make that buying and selling go faster increase the buy price by 1-3gp and decrease the sell price by 1-3 gp. Flipping is easy.

Wait wouldn’t that be the wrong way round? Surely you would want to buy for 5% below market and sell for market or above?

I don’t merch that much however so I might have misunderstood.
[/quote]
The method I put up is how to find the “buy” and “sell” point for items and how to tweak them to go faster.[/quote]So basically flipping.

@Frell, Yea right. I never get the chance to talk to any.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

basically you want to be friends with jagex mods and get insider info about future updates and think about how theyll affect items

item.title: The laws of Merching?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Anieli, post:4, topic:420298”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=522855.msg3803236#msg3803236 date=1320233567]
Buy an item for 5% above market, write down the price you get it for, thats the sale price. Sell the item for 5% under, thats your buy price. Now to make that buying and selling go faster increase the buy price by 1-3gp and decrease the sell price by 1-3 gp. Flipping is easy.
[/quote]

Wait wouldn’t that be the wrong way round? Surely you would want to buy for 5% below market and sell for market or above?

I don’t merch that much however so I might have misunderstood.[/quote]
The method I put up is how to find the “buy” and “sell” point for items and how to tweak them to go faster.

Read full topic

item.title: The laws of Merching?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

…Just because they are a mod on Mopar won’t mean they are a god/goddess of Runescape. Take Andrew’s advice… Its really how you merchant now.

Andrew Ferguson:

Buy an item for 5% above market, write down the price you get it for, thats the sale price. Sell the item for 5% under, thats your buy price. Now to make that buying and selling go faster increase the buy price by 1-3gp and decrease the sell price by 1-3 gp. Flipping is easy.

Read full topic

item.title: The laws of Merching?
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:18, topic:420298”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=522855.msg3803621#msg3803621 date=1320264344]

I think I will start off at a lower priced item until I figure this out. I don’t want to fuck my self over.

haha, i started out with whips + d legs stuff like that, d scims and longs are good.
When you try to buy the item just run out of the GE and sit down till they buy it works trust me ^.^
[/quote]I am going to try rubies and chaos runes to begin with[/quote]

alright, it’s pretty simple, once u get the concept start working with higher priced items

@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Oh. So it was before free trade and wilderness came back. David PM me your rs2 user. I wants tah add you once fagex solves their stupid logging in issues for me.

I Flip, its decent cash if you have 100m+

Sometimes you lose money sometimes you make money

heres a guide, don’t be afraid to flip high-priced items, its a lot more profitable!
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RpejcnrWS0o[/youtube]

Its long but be watch the entire guide, it has a commentary
